Package io.atomix.protocols.raft

Class RaftClient.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.atomix.protocols.raft.RaftClient.Builder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Builder<RaftClient>
    Enclosing interface:
    RaftClient
    public abstract static class RaftClient.Builder
extends Object
implements Builder<RaftClient>
    Builds a new Raft client.

    New client builders should be constructed using the static RaftClient.builder() factory method. 

       
     RaftClient client = RaftClient.builder(new Address("123.456.789.0", 5000), new Address("123.456.789.1", 5000)
       .withTransport(new NettyTransport())
       .build();

    • Method Detail

      • withClientId

        public RaftClient.Builder withClientId​(String clientId)
        Sets the client ID.

        The client ID is a name that should be unique among all clients. The ID will be used to resolve and recover sessions.

        Parameters:
        clientId - The client ID.
        Returns:
        The client builder.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if clientId is null
